description: There are 4 loops the shortest being 4.7KM longest being 23.4KM.  The trail is nice and hilly with some decent rocky sections.  Pass by three lakes and they are great places to stop for a little rest.  Some sections get really muddy in the Spring.
directions: 23rd KM along HWY 60 in Algonquin Park.
title: Minnesing Trail
